introProductsSection.title: PRODUCTS
introProductsSection.description: Gataca has built three components to connect the secure digital ID ecosystem. We help issuers transform their CREDENTIALS into IDENTITY wallets in citizens and customers mobile phones that they can then CONNECT to services, from e-government through to car sharing.

productsData.title: Credentials
productsData.description: Provides all the tools necessary to issue and validate identity credentials according to W3C standards for global interoperability

bullets.title: SECURED
bullets.description: Biometric technologies guarantee that credentials are managed by the true owner

bullets.title: CERTIFIED
bullets.description: Post-quantum cryptography provides government-level security for the issuing Authority

productsData.title: Identity
productsData.description: Allows users to store identity credentials from any issuer worldwide and seamlessly authenticate to digital services from their mobile phone

bullets.title: REAL IDENTITY
bullets.description: Link of real person with facial recognition, anti-spoofing and liveness detection capabilities

bullets.title: VALIDATED CREDENTIALS
bullets.description: Certified validation of credentials with Trusted Authorities

bullets.title: ENHANCED SECURITY
bullets.description: Data and certification integrity with post-quantum cryptography

productsData.title: Connect
productsData.description: Combines the security levels of government-issued IDs with single-sign-on authentication capabilities

bullets.title: Automatic KYC/GDPR compliance
bullets.description: Keep peace of mind for GDPR and KYC compliance

bullets.title: Identity fraud reduction
bullets.description: Reduce risk of identity fraud with guaranteed data authenticity and ownership
